room_set_camera: With this function you can assign a camera to a specific viewport in a room other than the current one. You supply the room index, the view index (from 0 to 7) and then the index of the camera to use.
The index of the room to set the view camera of
The index of the view port to assign the camera to
The index of the camera to assign
The above code assigns a camera in a newly created room to view port [0].
